changeSet.author: synchro
changeSet.sql: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "${synchro.schema}"."/SYN/DIEF_PI_REGISTRO_TIPO_54"( "MANDT" NVARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, "EMPRESA" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "FILIAL" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "DT_INI" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "DT_FIN" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "CNPJ_CPF" NVARCHAR(14), "COD_MOD" NVARCHAR(2), "SER" NVARCHAR(4), "NUM_DOC" NVARCHAR(6), "CFOP" NVARCHAR(4), "CST_ICMS" NVARCHAR(3), "NUM_ITEM" NVARCHAR(6), "COD_ITEM" NVARCHAR(60), "QTD" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_ITEM" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_DA" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_BC_ICMS" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_BC_ICMSST" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_IPI" DECIMAL(25,6), "ALIQ_ICMS" DECIMAL(25,2)) UNLOAD PRIORITY 5 AUTO MERGE
